Key Match Events: Mattia Zaccagni scored in the final minute of stoppage time as Italy broke Croatiaâ€™s hearts at Euro 2024 on Monday.
Post-Match Reflections: It was a great satisfaction, we are very happy because we played against a team of great quality, demonstrating all our personality after the defeat against Spain.
I cannot explain my feelings right now because I'm so happy.
It was an indescribable emotion. Scoring the goal that helped the team to qualify, I'm so happy.
It's hard to find the words after this. We are all very disappointed, this was like a big final match for us. We wanted that win more than anything else.
Yeah, it really hurts, it still hurts and it will still hurt over the coming weeks and months, it's not easy.
Last minute Albania, last minute today. I can only congratulate the guys on the fight, the willingness, the sacrifice they showed. But here it is, it's not our tournament.
I'm empty, we don't know what to say. Until the last minute, we have everything and now I have no words. We are disappointed.
We're sorry that it wasn't that victory to go to the next round.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mattia Zaccagni's goal had echoes of Alessandro Del Piero's stunner against Germany in the 2006 World Cup semi-final.
Come-from-behind FC: Italy has come from behind to avoid defeat twice in three matches in Germany at Euro 2024.
